title: JSON schema for configuring PCIT CI/CD

read_only.description: Mount the container's root filesystem as read only

oneOf.description: The github-release plugin is used to publish files and artifacts to GitHub Release.

token.description: GitHub oauth token with public_repo or repo permission, see https://help.github.com/articles/creating-a-personal-access-token-for-the-command-line/

files.description: files to upload to GitHub Release, globs are allowed

checksum.description: checksum takes hash methods to include in your GitHub release for the files specified.

checksum_file.description: name used for checksum file. "CHECKSUM" is replaced with the chosen method

checksum_flatten.description: include only the basename of the file in the checksum file

draft.description: create a draft release if set to true

prerelease.description: set the release as prerelease if set to true

file_exists.description: what to do if an file asset already exists

note.description: file or string with notes for the release, see https://help.github.com/en/github/administering-a-repository/managing-releases-in-a-repository#creating-a-release

title.description: file or string for the title shown in the github release, see https://help.github.com/en/github/administering-a-repository/managing-releases-in-a-repository#creating-a-release

overwrite.description: force overwrite existing release informations (only title and note)

oneOf.description: this is a pcit demo plugin
The Docker plugin can be used to build and publish images to the Docker registry.

buildx_image.description:
docker buildx create --driver-opt image= , e.g.
moby/buildkit:buildx-stable-1
dockerpracticesig/buildkit:master

oneOf.description: The pages plugin is used to push dir to git.
The S3 plugin uploads files and build artifacts to your S3 bucket, or S3-compatible(example: Minio).

use_path_style_endpoint.description: when use minio, please set true

anyOf.description: run service container with default settings
run service container with custom settings

image.description: run git clone container image name

status.description:
string or array, one of 
failure 
success 
changed

event.description:
string or array, one of 
push 
pull_request 
tag 
cron

oneOf.description: step only include command with string fomat, see https://docs.ci.khs1994.com/usage/steps.html
step only include command with array fomat, see https://docs.ci.khs1994.com/usage/steps.html

services.description: Additional containers to host services for a job. These are useful for creating databases or cache services like redis. see https://docs.ci.khs1994.com/usage/services.html
